actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for a separate agency within the Department of Labor to be known as the Veterans' Employment Service, and to authorize the appointment of an Assistant Secretary of Labor for Veterans' Employment.

summary.text: Establishes within the Department of Labor the Veterans' Employment Service headed by the Assistant Secretary of Labor for Veterans' Employment, a position established by this Act, to carry out the policies of specified provisions of law pertaining to veterans' employment and training.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a separate agency within the Department of Labor to be known as the Veterans' Employment Service, and to authorize the appointment of an Assistant Secretary of Labor for Veterans' Employment.
